title: Beware of the Voices | Yahtzee's Dev Diary
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

This episode of Yahtzee’s Dev Diary, Yahtzee makes the revelation that internet commenters are occasionally still helpful, especially where commentary of truckers is concerned.
